name: Bradley Cooper
summary: Bradley Cooper. Actor: A Star Is Born. Bradley Charles Cooper was born on January 5, 1975 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. His mother, Gloria (Campano), is of Italian descent, and worked for a local NBC station. His father, Charles John Cooper, who was of Irish descent, was a stockbroker. Immediately after Bradley graduated from the Honors English program at Georgetown University in 1997, he moved to New York City to enroll in...
awards: Nominated for 9 Oscars | 61 wins & 218 nominations total
